title: Is this what the Apple Car interior will look like? | Trusted Reviews
description:
![applecarconcept2](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)

**The[Apple Car](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/apple-car-news-rumours-
driverless-price-release-date-electric) has been shrouded in mystery for some
time now.**

While bits of information on the secretive project have come to light over the
past months, very little is known about Apple’s autonomous vehicle.

While an array of concept designs from fans and designers have speculated as
to what the car might look like, few have focused on the interior design.

Now Argentinian designer [Matias
Papalini](https://www.behance.net/matipapalini) has provided his vision of the
Apple Car interior with a series of dashboard concept designs.

**Related:[CES 2016](https://www.trustedreviews.com/hubs/ces-2016)**

The images show what looks to be a detachable steering wheel with a large,
presumably touch-sensitive, screen running the length of the dashboard.

There are also buttons on the steering wheel that can be used to control
various aspects of the car and, of course, space to dock your iPhone.
